Text saved: Sometimes you dream about something.
For example, you dream about a phone call from an old friend.
Or you dream that someone you know dies.
Then, this thing happens in real life.

This is not because the dream told you the future.
It probably just happened by chance.
We also have many dreams about these things.
But usually, they do not happen.
We forget about those dreams.
